public final class ReflectionInjectionEngine

An InjectionEngine that uses reflection to inject smocks.

Method Detail

createAndInject

public <T> SutDescriptor<T> createAndInject(Class<T> typeOfSystemUnderTest,
                                            InjectionPoint injectionPoint,
                                            MockDescriptor... mocks)
Description copied from interface: InjectionEngine
Instantiates and injects mocks.

Specified by:
createAndInject in interface InjectionEngine
Parameters:
typeOfSystemUnderTest - type of the system under test that is to be created
injectionPoint - defines the injection point
mocks - a list of mocked objected that will be used to populate injected fields, if no matching mock is found on this list it will be created using the mockEngine.
Returns:
a set of mocks injected
